the future originally counter-strike was
to have a few fun side game modes based
on popular community server mods for
counter-strike source the first being
officially announced was an
implementation of gun game another was
known for years as only scavenger
unannounced scavenger was only known to
the community due to unused achievement
icons detailing the players possible
dealings in this unreleased game-mode
mechanically it wasn't known how this
game was even to be played for years
from the first day of CS COEs public
beta release in 2011 the concept of
scavenger was known but the specifics
were a mystery we had a few achievement
icons possibly a few script files and no
idea how the game was played it was one
of the largest mysteries in relation to
Counter Strike global Offensive
development until March of this year
when the half-life 2 beta team did some
trickery and wound up with a build that
was used to demo the game to the public
for the first time back at PAX in August
of 2011 a full three months before the
very first limited number of closed beta
keys were even given out to the public
and over a year before the game's full
release obviously this build holds much
more unseen and cut content than just
this one game mode but seeing how
scavenger has been entirely unknown for
years it's exciting to know that this
build contains the entire thing working
in complete order and as you've probably
figured out it's public and available to
download for free in the link down below
the gameplays as an alternate rule set
to arms race where instead of unlocking
weapons as the player scores more points
the weapons are already available placed
randomly or
the map two teams of five compete to not
only work the map to find the best
weapons but also stay alive and remove
the other team no respawning rounds are
played like a standard game of Counter
Strike and the buy menu is disabled the
players are limited to the weapons the
map provides to quote-unquote
scavenge what's funny about this demo
build is that those unused achievements
that were the only thing we knew about
scavenger for years are here and they
work so it's possible to see these icons
pop up during gameplay as it currently
stands there are no servers running this
game mode however offline bots
work fine and if anyone gets a server up
